summary: REQ-12 appears implemented: in frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts, rank 1 name is "Atif Aslam" and rank 2 name is "Arijit Singh"; other fields shown for those entries (id, avatar, reachScore, previousReachScore, isTopTrending) appear unchanged in the provided snippet. However, there are unrelated documentation/state summary edits describing broader UI/theme changes that were not requested.
